text:
@NYGovCuomo You are a disgrace!

66% have DIED at home during quarantine

Over 5,000+ have died in Nursing Homes that were not prepared to handle #COVID19 
YOU did Not make them a #Priority 
YOU made them an #Example so YOU could dictate your new rules!

#BloodOnCuomosHands
@nytimes @ABC @AP
